about_the_game:
A Blocc World. The best kind of world. A world of discovery, adventure and smashing fun.

Wander through peaceful fields, golden sands and towering trees, and dare to dream that you could be the hero this world needs. Stop dreaming. This world needs a hero.

You'll need to train. Smash your way through the ugly beasts trying to ruin your peaceful paradise. Learn from your battles. Unlock new powers to smash even harder. Steal items and equipment from your vanquished foes. Don't worry about the ethical concerns of looting the deceased, it's all for the Quest. Don't stop to clean up after yourself, that will only slow you down. Focus! The Quest!

You'll need help. Make friends on your travels. Help them with their troubles and they might just help you too. But don't get too friendly, they'll distract you from the Quest.

You'll be tested. Some of the ugly beasts pack quite a punch. But they stand in the way of you and the Quest. You know what that means.

You'll be Quested. The Quest is a quest that you need to quest. Quest.

name: A Blocc World Demo
short_description: A voxel-style open-world RPG. Use a variety of melee, ranged and magical combat abilities to smash your way to saving the world. Grow your strength, with powerful abilities and equipment. Learn about the world of Blocc from friendly characters, and try to keep them in one piece.
